abs.description: Applies the abs PHP function to a value.

capitalize.description: Capitalizes a string by applying the ucwords PHP function to the value

convert_encoding.description: Converts a string from one charset to another

default.description: Sets a default value in case the evaluated expression is empty, not set or evaluates to falsy value

json_encode.description: Converts a value into its JSON representation

json_decode.description: Converts a value from its JSON representation to a PHP representation

join.description: Joins the array parts using a separator join

keys.description: Returns the array keys using array_keys

left_trim.description: Applies the ltrim PHP function to the value. Removing extra spaces

length.description: Counts the string length or how many items are in an array or object

lower.description: Change the case of a string to lowercase

nl2br.description:
Changes newlines \n by line breaks (
). Uses the PHP function nl2br

right_trim.description: Applies the rtrim PHP function to the value. Removing extra spaces

sort.description: Sorts an array using the PHP function asort

stripslashes.description: Applies the stripslashes PHP function to the value. Removing escaped quotes

striptags.description: Applies the striptags PHP function to the value. Removing HTML tags

trim.description: Applies the trim PHP function to the value. Removing extra spaces

upper.description: Change the case of a string to uppercase

url_encode.description: Applies the urlencode PHP function to the value
